titles.title: Reinstatement of Medicare Bonus and Capital Payment for Rehabilitation Hospitals Act of 1998
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to reinstate certain bonus and capital payment levels for rehabilitation hospital services under part A of the Medicare Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/19/1998--Introduced. Reinstatement of Medicare Bonus and Capital Payment for Rehabilitation Hospitals Act of 1998 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to reinstate certain bonus thresholds and capital payment levels for rehabilitation hospitals and units.
